actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use of stimulus funds for signage indicating that a project is being carried out using those funds.

summary.text: Axe the Stimulus Plaques Act - Prohibits the use of funds made available under the American Recovery and Reinvestment Act of 2009 for signage to indicate that a particular project is being carried out using such funds.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of stimulus funds for signage indicating that a project is being carried out using those funds.
